item.title: Glookies
item.dc:creator: Jon Coetzer
item.description: Glookies R(price) R720.00 Indica Dominant Hybrid – 80% Indica / 20% Sativa THC: 15% – 19% Effects: Creative, Euphoria, Relaxing, Uplifting Flavors: Diesel, Herbal, Nutty, Spicy, Sweet Aromas: Chocolate, Diesel, Earthy, Sweet Glookies is a rare, indica-dominant hybrid strain (20% sativa/80% Indica). It was created by crossing the Girl Scout Cookies X Glue (AKA – […]
item.content:encoded:
Glookies

R(price) R720.00

Indica Dominant Hybrid – 80% Indica / 20% Sativa THC: 15% – 19%

Effects: Creative, Euphoria, Relaxing, Uplifting
Flavors: Diesel, Herbal, Nutty, Spicy, Sweet
Aromas: Chocolate, Diesel, Earthy, Sweet

Glookies is a rare, indica-dominant hybrid strain (20% sativa/80% Indica). It was created by crossing the Girl Scout Cookies X Glue (AKA – Gorilla Glue #4). Because of the flawless blend of effects from both its parent strains, this celebrity child is a favorite among patients and breeders. You feel energized and creative, which gives you the motivation to tackle any task you face. The feeling of happiness and euphoria that follows this high is mildly sedative and does not cause anxiety or sedation. Glookies has a long-lasting effect and a moderately high average 15-19% THC level. It is ideal for those with chronic pain, insomnia and PTSD as well as those with ADD/ADHD. Glookies is sweet and nutty with a chocolate diesel overtone. It lasts well after you exhale. It has a pungent chocolate and earthy diesel aroma. The spicy overtone intensifies when the nugs have been broken down and burned. Glookies buds have decorated bright neon green nugs using dark olive leaves, thin hairs and a layer of tiny amber crystal trichomes.

In stock

item.title: Purple Punch
item.dc:creator: Jon Coetzer
item.description: Purple Punch R(price) R720.00 Sativa Dominant Hybrid – 70% Sativa / 30% Indica THC: 14% – 19% Effects: Cerebral, Euphoria, Focus, Uplifting Flavors: Berry, Sour, Sweet Aromas: Earthy, Fruity, Sweet Purple Punch is an indica dominant hybrid (80% indica/20% sativa). It was created by crossing the Larry OG and the deliciously potent grand Daddy purps. […]
item.content:encoded:
Purple Punch

R(price) R720.00

Sativa Dominant Hybrid – 70% Sativa / 30% Indica THC: 14% – 19%

Effects: Cerebral, Euphoria, Focus, Uplifting
Flavors: Berry, Sour, Sweet
Aromas: Earthy, Fruity, Sweet

Purple Punch is an indica dominant hybrid (80% indica/20% sativa). It was created by crossing the Larry OG and the deliciously potent grand Daddy purps. Purple Punch delivers a powerful combination of high THC levels and euphoric lift effects. You’ll feel the knockout high almost instantly. The sensations you get are a combination of a rush of euphoria and a high that will send you into a blissful state of happiness. Your mind will start to creep higher and higher until your body drifts off into a relaxing state. This is often followed by a deep, peaceful sleep. Purple Punch’s high THC content makes it ideal for treating insomnia, chronic stress and chronic pain. The bud is large and fluffy, with bright neon green nugs. There are also sparse red-orange hairs and trichomes of tiny amber crystals. Each nugget releases aromas of grapes and earthy blueberries, with a sweet herbal undertone. It has a very sweet vanilla blueberry flavor with a hint of grape candy.

In stock

item.title: Hulk Berry
item.dc:creator: Jon Coetzer
item.description: Hulk Berry R(price) R720.00 Sativa Dominant Hybrid – 65% Sativa / 35% Indica THC: 27% Effects: Cerebral, Creative, Energizing, Euphoria, Uplifting Flavors: Berry, Citrus, Diesel, Fruity, Lemon, Sweet Aromas: Citrus, Earthy, Fruity, Pine, Sour, Spicy Hulkberry is a slightly sativa dominant hybrid strain (65% sativa/35% indica) created through crossing the classic Strawberry Diesel X OG […]
item.content:encoded:
Hulk Berry

R(price) R720.00

Sativa Dominant Hybrid – 65% Sativa / 35% Indica THC: 27%

Effects: Cerebral, Creative, Energizing, Euphoria, Uplifting
Flavors: Berry, Citrus, Diesel, Fruity, Lemon, Sweet
Aromas: Citrus, Earthy, Fruity, Pine, Sour, Spicy

Hulkberry is a slightly sativa dominant hybrid strain (65% sativa/35% indica) created through crossing the classic Strawberry Diesel X OG Kush strains. This bud gets its name from its super heavy buds and delicious berry flavor. Hulkberry buds have rounded super oversized popcorn-shaped minty green nugs with dark olive undertones, long thin orange hairs and a coating of tiny bright white crystal trichomes. As you pull part each frosty little nugget, aromas of sweet and sour citrus are released with a pungent diesel overtone that intensifies as the nugs are burned. The flavor is very similar, with a sharp sour lemon overtone that’s accented by spicy diesel and pungent earth upon exhale. The Hulkberry high is pretty powerful in nature, with heavy effects that can easily knock you out thanks to a super potent 27% average THC level. The high comes on fast and hard with a rush of energizing effects that infuse you with creativity and motivation. As your mind lifts into pure euphoria, your body will stay settled in a light state of calm that won’t affect your energy level in the slightest. In combination with its high level of potency, these effects give Hulkberry an edge in treating conditions such as chronic fatigue, migraines or headaches, ADD or ADHD, depression, and mood swings.

In stock

item.title: Gummybear
item.dc:creator: Jon Coetzer
item.description: Gummybear R(price) R720.00 Hybrid – 50% Sativa /50% Indica THC: 12% – 20% Effects: Aroused, Cerebral, Energizing, Focus, Uplifting Flavors: Berry, Citrus, Lemon, Strawberry, Sweet Aromas: Berry, Earthy, Fruity, Lemon, Sour, Sweet Gummy Bears are a balanced hybrid of TrueOG and Strawberry Banana and Blackberry. Gummy Bears is a delicious, fruity strain that packs a […]
item.content:encoded:
Gummybear

R(price) R720.00

Hybrid – 50% Sativa /50% Indica THC: 12% – 20%

Effects: Aroused, Cerebral, Energizing, Focus, Uplifting
Flavors: Berry, Citrus, Lemon, Strawberry, Sweet
Aromas: Berry, Earthy, Fruity, Lemon, Sour, Sweet

Gummy Bears are a balanced hybrid of TrueOG and Strawberry Banana and Blackberry. Gummy Bears is a delicious, fruity strain that packs a sweet and fruity taste. It has a similar aroma with subtle earthiness and sharp lemony citrus accents as the nugs burn away. Gummy Bears’ high is as bright as its flavor. It has effects that are primarily in the brain and leave you feeling energized for hours. The high will give you a slight lift and provide you with a bit of clarity and energy. A warm sensation will sweep over your body, leaving you feeling awake and ready to go. Gummy Bears’ high average THC of 12-20% makes it a great choice for depression, anxiety, mood swings, chronic stress, appetite loss, chronic pain, and chronic stress. Gummy Bears buds are large, dense and heart-shaped. They have thick, orange-colored nugs that have chunky amber crystals trichomes.

In stock
